item.title: 5S for Software Teams
item.description: A Practical Implementation Playbook for Engineering Repositories and JIRA - A Practical Implementation Playbook for Engineering Repositories and JIRA Inspired by the 5S methodology from the Toyota Production System. Why 5S for Software? Modern software teams suffer from invisible clutter: Bloated repositories Stale branches Unclear ownership Massive backlogs Misleading metrics 5S brings operational discipline to: Code repositories JIRA boards Agile...
